description: A short description of the project.

__prompts__.project_name: Name of project that will be the header for the README.md. Input to start with alphabet. Only whitespace as separators.
__prompts__.description: A short description of the project that will be populated in README.md. Max of 72 characters.
__prompts__.repo_name: Name of repository. Name of the repository folder. Input to start with alphabet characters. No whitespaces or underscores are allowed.
__prompts__.src_package_name: Name of the source code's package under the src folder. Input to start with alphabet characters. No whitespaces or hyphens are allowed.
__prompts__.src_package_name_short: The alias for the source code's package. Input to start with alphabet characters. No whitespaces or hyphens are allowed.

platform.__prompt__: The platform the project is running on.

orchestrator.__prompt__: The orchestrator the project is using.

__prompts__.runai_proj_name: The RunAI namespace used by the project - the project name that you're sending jobs to.
__prompts__.harbor_registry_project_path: Path of the Harbor registry repository for your container images to be located under. Cannot end with a slash character.
__prompts__.author_name: Your alias or project team's name. Relatively arbitrary. No hyphens are allowed.
